title: Redeemer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Appear to a player at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If the player dies, you will assume unlimited charges of their abilities, unless those abilities include conversion of any kind.
- You can appear to players who are killed by an ability which prevents other visits (Jailor, Wisteria, etc)
- You may only use one ability per night, including appearing to a player.
- If the player does not die, they will learn you are the Redeemer. This will not apply if the player is protected or has their visitors stopped.
- When you have gained two abilities, the Saint will gain a Saint point.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who reject the Hallow's will.

desc:
Post 777
*Allow me, child, and perhaps your talents may still be used for the greater good...*
